channel.title: Extending trade distance?
channel.description: I have, for instance, a barkeeper behind a bar. There's no way to get inside of the bar. Can I make it so I can trade from a further distance away, and how?[br][size=1]Posted at: October 16, 2006, 10:22:45 PM[/size][hr]Still need help :D.[br][size=1]Posted at: October 17, 2006, 07:42:11 AM[/size][hr]Doo doo doo....

item.title: Extending trade distance?
item.dc:creator: @mrdek11 mrdek11
item.description:
@mrdek11 wrote:

Fine I’ll be nice

Go to the case of your bartender, and change:

WanneShop = ##;

to

openUpShop(##);

Cheers, and yes, I see what you mean, I thought you were yelling at me as well. Sorry

PS, chill.

Read full topic

item.title: Extending trade distance?
item.dc:creator: @IcyPimp IcyPimp
item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

Hey dek, try reading what I said one more time. Explain to me the part you need to do. I’m sorry if I offended you somehow, but like I said, IF YOU’RE NOT POSTING HOW TO FIX IT, DON’T POST.

Do you get it?

I don’t give a rat’s ass about what you’ve done. If you’re being a jerk and not posting it, just because I offended people for PISSING me off, then you need to get the hell out.

Read full topic

item.title: Extending trade distance?
item.dc:creator: @mrdek11 mrdek11
item.description:
@mrdek11 wrote:

[quote=“IcyPimp, post:18, topic:18738”]No you didn’t. :D. And I said, if you don’t have the solution to my problem, don’t post. If you really do have it, and decide not to post, that’s completely up to you. But if that was the case, don’t post.

Mmk?[/quote]
Oh I didn’t? Then why don’t you check PlayScape, I’ve used it in a few places now.[br][size=1]Posted at: October 22, 2006, 08:58:57 PM[/size][hr][quote=“lawl, post:1, topic:19517”][quote author=mrdek11 link=topic=28213.msg340583#msg340583 date=1161577798]
ok… You know what? you can yell at the people saying to use noclip, but most of us are trying to help. I spent 4 hours working on it yesterday night, and I just came to post how to do it. But I’m an idiot, so I guess not.
[/quote]
yes you are.
anyway, it shouldnt be hard. look for where the trading of npc’s is initiated, and work your way from there (there should be something that moves you to the npc, remove it by checking the npc id)
searching for trade might help.[/quote]
I guess I don’t see how the original person to have Clans and Player Owned houses, and Player Owned Businesses is an idiot… But ok then.

Read full topic

yes you are.
anyway, it shouldnt be hard. look for where the trading of npc’s is initiated, and work your way from there (there should be something that moves you to the npc, remove it by checking the npc id)
searching for trade might help.[/quote]
